'''Radiant Spincrystal 115''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Loch's Revitalization]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located at the [[Weeping Willow of the Lake]].
